mapper.select: SELECT A.`SBE_POS_SEQ` AS postSeq, A.`SBE_POS_TITLE` AS postTitle, A.`SBE_POS_VIEW_COUNT` AS postViewCount, C.`SBE_USR_NAME` AS postRegUserName, DATE_FORMAT(A.`SBE_POS_REG_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS postRegDate, B.`SBE_CTG_NAME` AS postCategoryName FROM `SBE_POS` A INNER JOIN `SBE_CTG` B ON A.`SBE_CTG_SEQ` = B.`SBE_CTG_SEQ` INNER JOIN `SBE_USR` C ON A.`SBE_POS_REG_USR_ID` = C.`SBE_USR_ID` WHERE B.`SBE_BOD_SEQ` = #{boardSeq}

SELECT A.`SBE_POS_SEQ` AS postSeq, A.`SBE_POS_TITLE` AS postTitle, A.`SBE_POS_VIEW_COUNT` AS postViewCount, C.`SBE_USR_NAME` AS postRegUserName, DATE_FORMAT(A.`SBE_POS_REG_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS postRegDate, B.`SBE_CTG_NAME` AS postCategoryName FROM `SBE_POS` A INNER JOIN `SBE_CTG` B ON A.`SBE_CTG_SEQ` = B.`SBE_CTG_SEQ` INNER JOIN `SBE_USR` C ON A.`SBE_POS_REG_USR_ID` = C.`SBE_USR_ID` WHERE B.`SBE_CTG_SEQ` = #{categorySeq}
